short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on the comments you find most interesting.
short.nl: Focus op de reacties die jij het meest interessant vindt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time and go through a discussion breadth-first instead of depth-first. This avoids automatically getting caught by long threads and gives you an overview of different comments on a topic so that you can dive into the ones you find most interesting, for only as deep as you want.

Supports:
* Hacker News
* Lobsters
* Tweakers

bikeshedding [noun]
  : futile expenditure of time and energy in discussion of marginal technical issues
long.nl:
Voorkom dat lange threads in een discussie automatisch je aandacht trekken. Besluit zelf in welke thread je duikt en tot hoe diep door jezelf eerst in de breedte te oriÃ«nteren.

Ondersteunt:
* Hacker News
* Lobsters
* Tweakers

bikeshedding [noun]
  : futile expenditure of time and energy in discussion of marginal technical issues
